features.name: Mental Resistance
features.description: The broodgard has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't paralyze it.

features.name: Reckless
features.description:
At the start of its turn, the broodgard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that run,
but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description:
The broodguard makes three attacks:
one with its bite and two with its claws.
